article_title: Your Views: Republican proposal would gut worker’s compensation
article_text:
Gov. Scott Walker and the Republicans are totally out of control! They are now out to gut worker’s compensation in...

article_metadata.Description: The proposed legislation allows the employer to avoid paying lost wages for a legitimate, conceded claim by firing the employee while the person is recovering.
article_metadata.author: Letter to the editor
